mapper.select: SELECT QB_BOARDNO,QB_ID,QB_NICKNAME ,QB_TITLE,QB_CONTENT, QB_SECRET ,QB_FLAG ,QB_REDATE ,QB_REGDATE FROM (SELECT QB_BOARDNO,QB_ID ,QB_NICKNAME ,QB_TITLE,QB_CONTENT, QB_SECRET ,QB_FLAG ,QB_REDATE ,QB_REGDATE,ROWNUM AS RNUM FROM (SELECT QB_BOARDNO,QB_ID ,QB_NICKNAME ,QB_TITLE,QB_CONTENT, QB_SECRET ,QB_FLAG ,QB_REDATE ,QB_REGDATE FROM QNA_BOARD ORDER BY QB_BOARDNO) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #{startNum}) WHERE RNUM >= #{endNum} ORDER BY QB_BOARDNO DESC
